original_text: The woman was wearing clothes that were made from expensive cloth. She also wore bright things that made her look beautiful. She shone with gold, valuable stones and pearls. She held a gold cup in her hand. The cup was full of the bad and disgusting things that she had caused people to do.
korean_text: 그 여자는 자주 빛과 붉은 빛 옷을 입고 금과 보석과 진주로 꾸미고 손에 금 잔을 가졌는데 가증한 물건과 그의 음행의 더러운 것들이 가득하더라

sentences.original_text: that were made from expensive cloth
She held a gold cup in her hand
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 손에 금 잔을 들고 있었다

sentences.original_text: The cup was full of the bad and disgusting things
sentences.korean_translation: 그 잔은 나쁘고 역겨운 것들로 가득했다

sentences.original_text: that she had caused people to do
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들은 그녀가 사람들에게 하게 한 것들이었다
